descriptionLucas: I have a passion for building clean, scalable and well-architected software solutions.
p1: This application is a project developed by two students/friends/roommates, for the Undergraduate Course Completion Work. The idea arose from the need on the part of the institution, for a solution that centralized the process of registration and submission of extension actions.
p2: We are undergraduate students in Software Engineering at the Federal University of Pampa. We are in the final stretch of the course, currently in the 7th regular semester, of 9 semesters. We were both born in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil, and in addition to college, we work fully as Fullstack Developers at
